title: Calories in a Salami Slice
meta_description: Learn calories in salami slice, plus detailed nutrition facts like fat, protein, sodium, and variations for your diet tracking.
assumptions: Typical dry Italian salami slice (~10 g), cured pork/beef, no added cheese or bread.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (e.g., Genoa vs. hard salami), slice thickness, and curing process. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One typical salami slice has ~38 kcal, high in fat and sodium.
